channel.title: Error in RunServer! (REPLY)
channel.description:
This isn't in the compile area, this in the RunServer.bat
[code]Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2 253 3254" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1279) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:27) [/code]
I can connect, but it's just a black screen. :O
[b]EDIT:[/b] Wow! I just got this error, and now. I CAN'T sign onto my server. [code]Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ClassFormatError: Truncated class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I tried adding a shop, with a one click person. :(
Any ideas?

item.title: Error in RunServer! (REPLY)
item.dc:creator: @Steph1 .Steph
item.description:
@Steph1 wrote:

This is what I’ve got here. Whats wrong with it?

spawn = 2253    3254	3433	0	0	0	0	0	0	Wise Old Man - Pure Shop

@I_0ne_H1t_K0 wrote:

Uhh God That Happens To Me Sometimes Aswell … No Idea How To Fix It I Usually Just Remove The Numbers It Says :S One Time I Had One Saying

"For Input String: “1032 50000”

And I Removed It And It Worked Fine With The Other Items :S

Read full topic

item.title: Error in RunServer! (REPLY)
item.dc:creator: @Steph1 .Steph
item.description:
@Steph1 wrote:

This isn’t in the compile area, this in the RunServer.bat

Starting pimpscape Server on 0.0.0.0:43594 Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "2 253 3254" at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Unknown Source) at NPCHandler.loadAutoSpawn(NPCHandler.java:1279) at NPCHandler.<init>(NPCHandler.java:23) at server.main(server.java:27)

I can connect, but it’s just a black screen.

EDIT: Wow! I just got this error, and now. I CAN’T sign onto my server.

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.ClassFormatError: Truncated class file at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass1(Native Method) at java.lang.ClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.security.SecureClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.defineClass(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader.access$000(Unknown Source) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClassInternal(Unknown Source) Press any key to continue . . .

I tried adding a shop, with a one click person.

Any ideas?

Read full topic
